```{r setup}
library(nycflights13)
library(tidyverse)
flights_select <- flights %>% select(year,month, day, carrier, flight, tailnum)
```

```{r table1}
head(flights_select)
```

```{r table2}

  head(flights_select), 
  caption = "Table1: a table with a different lay-out."
)
```
